note.title: Capture Rome
note.text: Capture all the districts' townhalls of Rome.

note.title: Hannibal must survive
note.text: Only Hannibal can lead the Carthaginian army in this decisive battle against Rome. If he dies, there will be no other chance of victory.

note.title: Capture Ostia
note.text: Ostia is the most important port in the Italic peninsula: if you conquer it, not only will the Romans no longer receive reinforcements from the sea, but you will be the one to receive them from Carthage.

note.title: Roman allies
note.text: Reports have arrived that the Romans of Allifae are willing to join Carthage in the battle against Rome. Send Hannibal to talk with their leader, Olivius, to learn the conditions of the alliance.

note.id: Destroy one of the gates to Rome.
note.title: Destroy one of the gates to Rome
note.text: Olivius has requested that you show your strength by destroying one of the gates of Rome. Only then will he allow you to command his settlement.

note.title: Roman reinforcements
note.text: As long as you control a district of Rome, many of the enemy reinforcements will be redirected towards the city.
